DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational retrospective single-center study (CHRU of Nancy) in patients cared for acute dyspnea by a medical team of the emergencies of the CHRU of Nancy. The main purpose of the study is to evaluate the outcome of patients cared for acute dyspnea by a medical team of emergencies of CHRU of Nancy.
DOC.brief_title: PAthwAy of Dyspneic patIent in Emergency (PArADIsE)
DOC.detailed_description: This observational retrospective single-center study will be conducted using data from medical records, acquired as part of usual care, patients cared for acute dyspnea in the last 5 years (from the date of authorization of data processing). About 4,000 patients will be affected, including more than 800 patients with acute heart failure.
